headline: 3 Beaten-Down Dividend Stocks for Patient Investors to Buy in July and Hold for Years to Come
summary: Occidental Petroleum consistently generates strong free cash flow to source its dividend payments.  One way to achieve this is to invest in companies with reasonable valuations that also pay dividends.  Here's why Watsco (NYSE: WSO), Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY), and Campbell's Company (NASDAQ: CPB) stand out as three dividend stocks to load up on now.
